wikipedia_page.main: Ernest "Ernie" McGarr (born 9 March 1944) is a Scottish former professional footballer, who played as a goalkeeper for several clubs in the Scottish Football League and was capped twice for the Scotland national side.

response: *Ernie McGarr, Aberdeen and Scotland.Dark Blue Dons - Ernie McGarr  afc.co.uk, 13 February 2007, Retrieved 24 June 2011

Clark started his senior career in Scotland's second tier with Queen's Park F.C.Players: Clark, Robert Brown, QPFC.comBobby Clark: Profile of a Dons great, Aberdeen FC, 11 September 2018 then in 1965 signed for top division Aberdeen F.C., with whom he won the 1970 Scottish Cup, the 1976 League Cup and the 1980 Premier League Championship. During his time with the Dons, Clark played some games as a defender, including against Rangers at Ibrox Park, after losing his place in goal to Ernie McGarr. With 594 competitive appearances for Aberdeen between 1965 and 1980, he is ranked third in the club's all-time list.
